org.cyclops.cyclopscore.client.key

Class KeyRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cyclops.cyclopscore.client.key.KeyRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IKeyRegistry, IRegistry

    public class KeyRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
implements IKeyRegistry
    Enum that contains all custom hotkeys that are added. Every key also has a KeyBinding for that specific key.

        name - The unique name.
        defaultKey - The keycode.

      • onPlayerKeyInput

        public void onPlayerKeyInput(net.minecraftforge.client.event.InputEvent.KeyInputEvent event)
        Description copied from interface: IKeyRegistry
        Handles key presses for keybindings added by EvilCraft Make sure to annotate this with SubscribeEvent
        Specified by:
        onPlayerKeyInput in interface IKeyRegistry
        Parameters:
        event - The input event.

      • addKeyHandler

        public void addKeyHandler(net.minecraft.client.settings.KeyBinding kb,
                          IKeyHandler handler)
        Description copied from interface: IKeyRegistry
        Binds a IKeyHandler to key presses of the specified KeyBinding. Whenever the KeyBinding is pressed, IKeyHandler.onKeyPressed(KeyBinding) is called.
        Specified by:
        addKeyHandler in interface IKeyRegistry
        Parameters:
        kb - KeyBinding to which we bind the IKeyHandler.
        handler - IKeyHandler that will be linked to presses of the given KeyBinding.
